en.name: Nighttime Whispers in the Echoing Woods
en.4p: After using an Elemental Skill, gain a 20% Geo DMG Bonus for 10s. While under a shield granted by the Crystallize reaction, the above effect will be increased by 150%, and this additional increase disappears 1s after that shield is lost.

zh.name: 回声之林夜话
zh.4p: 施放元素战技后的10秒内，岩元素伤害加成提升20%；若处于结晶反应的护盾庇护下，上述效果提高150%，进一步提高的效果将在失去结晶护盾庇护的1秒后解除。
